data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shear, William A., Steinmann, David B. (2013): Cave millipedes of the United States. XIII. A new, troglobiotic species of Austrotyla from Colorado (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida, Conotylidae). Zootaxa 3745 (4): 486-490, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3745.4.6
